DC Inverting Amplifiers Using Opamps

01/2016

Introduction

For opamps, the voltage at the + and - inputs are equal, so with the + input attached to ground, the voltage at the - input is 0 volts. Also, the current into the + and - inputs of the opamp is 0 amps (or close enough to be considered an ideal opamp).
